default.title: DISCOVERY
default.subtitle: 30-min free call
default.description: Deep-dive conversation about your goals, history, current level, and the events you're targeting. No cookie-cutter approaches.

default.title: ASSESSMENT
default.subtitle: Full performance analysis
default.description: Comprehensive physical and mental performance testing. We identify your strengths, weaknesses, and biggest growth opportunities.

default.title: PROGRAM
default.subtitle: Custom-built for you
default.description: Your coach builds a periodized plan tailored to your competition schedule, with built-in progression markers.

default.title: DOMINATE
default.subtitle: Continuous optimization
default.description: Execute with ongoing coach feedback, weekly check-ins, and real-time adjustments. We refine as you evolve.
